# Repository Assets

This directory contains visual assets for the Coolify Tweaks repository.

## Files

### `cover.png`
The main cover image displayed in the README. This is a high-resolution image (4250x2948px) showcasing the Coolify Tweaks interface.

### `og-image.png`
The Open Graph preview image optimized for social media sharing (1280x640px). This image is used as the repository's social preview on GitHub and appears when the repository is shared on platforms like Twitter, LinkedIn, Discord, and Slack.

**To set this as the repository social preview:**
1. Go to the repository settings on GitHub
2. Navigate to "General" â†’ "Social preview"
3. Upload `.github/assets/og-image.png`

This ensures the repository looks professional when shared on social media platforms.

### `screenshots/`
Contains screenshots of the Coolify Tweaks interface for documentation purposes.

### `stylus-*.png`
Screenshots showing Stylus configuration for users installing the userstyle.
